name: A Quiet Winter Walk Home
description:
Enjoy a quiet walk home from the train station.

Controls - Keyboard
  • Move - WASD
  • Confirm - Space
  • Back/Run - Left Shift
  • Menu - E
Controls - Gamepad (XBOX Face Buttons)
  • Move - DPad/Sticks
  • Confirm - A
  • Back/Run - X
  • Menu - Start
How to Run Windows

Open Windows/A Winter Walk.exe

OSX

Open Mac/A_Winter_Walk.app

Or

Download Love - https://github.com/love2d/love/releases/download/11.3/love-11.3-macos.zip

Using love.app, launch Linux/A_Winter_Walk.love

Linux

Download Love 11.3 - https://github.com/love2d/love/releases

Using love, launch Linux/A_Winter_Walk.love

Libraries
  • Anim8 - Enrique García Cota
    https://github.com/kikito/anim8
  • Bump - Enrique García Cota
    https://github.com/kikito/bump.lua
  • Bump-niji - shru
    https://github.com/oniietzschan/bump-niji
  • Deep - Nikoloz Otiashvili
    https://github.com/Nikaoto/deep  
  • HUMP - Matthias Richter
    https://github.com/vrld/hump/     
  • SYSL-Libraries - Sysl (CHall)
Audio
  • Carol of the Bells
  • The Countess of Farnhams Waltz
  • Transit of Venus March
  • Alice Where Art Thou
  • Sound Effects from GDC Audio Packs
